attributes.action: Stop the public order act from effecting free speech
attributes.additional_details: Stop the public order act effecting freedom of speech to enable the speaker to denounce what they believe is harmful to what he believes is an wronged injustice to Great Britain and can use any term or word and any context that the public order can be used to stop ie: either a religious or demographic quotation or ones own personal thought as to what they believe is wrong about certain religous or ethnic groups and the problems that he believes is wrong and is personal views or the views of others of which he has been asked to comment on .
